issues.title: Create project repository and GitHub Project board
issues.body:
Set up a monorepo containing Next.js and Convex backend.
- Create a GitHub Project board with columns: Backlog, In Progress, In Review, Done.
- Create basic labels and assign permissions.

issues.title: Define labeling system and contributor workflow
issues.body:
Create and document the labeling system (frontend, backend, infra, auth, payments, algorithm, integration, design, urgent, low priority, bug, documentation, enhancement, help wanted, question).
Write short onboarding instructions for contributors.

issues.title: Design initial Convex database schema
issues.body:
Define entities: User, Studio, Category, Lesson, LessonInstance, Enrollment, Payment, AttendanceRecord.
Map relationships, IDs, indexes, and required fields.
Deliverable: ERD and schema plan.

issues.title: Implement Convex schema with required tables
issues.body:
Implement Convex schema definitions for all tables.
Add indexes for lessonId, userId, categoryId, and date.

issues.title: Build minimal POC with Next.js, Convex and Clerk
issues.body:
Create a single Next.js page using a Convex query.
Implement basic Clerk sign-in/sign-out.
Deploy the POC to Vercel.

issues.title: Define project structure and frontend architecture
issues.body:
Create folder structure for: app, components, features, services, hooks, convex.
Define routing strategy and shared UI components.

issues.title: Define Convex backend architecture
issues.body:
Plan backend functions: queries, mutations, actions.
Define patterns for validation, error handling, and role enforcement.

issues.title: Implement Clerk authentication in the app
issues.body:
Configure Clerk tenant, roles and metadata.
Add ClerkProvider and protected routes.
Ensure sign-in/sign-out and basic user data retrieval work.

issues.title: Implement RBAC in Convex
issues.body:
Add helper functions such as requireRole.
Protect Convex functions by user role.
Sync Clerk users into a Convex users table.

issues.title: Create wireframes for core screens
issues.body: Design in Figma the main screens: Home, Category, Lesson, Smart Enrollment Wizard, Checkout, Teacher Dashboard, Admin CMS, Payment pages.

issues.title: Implement Home page layout and public content
issues.body: Build the Home page with banner, studio information, category grid, and links to smart enrollment and login.

issues.title: Build Category page with lessons listing
issues.body:
Fetch and display lessons by category from Convex.
Render responsive lesson cards with basic information and navigation.

issues.title: Implement lesson details page
issues.body:
Display lesson information: title, description, teacher, capacity, schedule.
Add an 'Add to Plan' or 'Enroll' button.

issues.title: Create Convex queries for lessons and instances
issues.body:
Implement Convex functions: getLessonById and listLessonInstancesByLesson.
Ensure proper indexing and validation.

issues.title: Integrate lesson page with Smart Enrollment Wizard
issues.body:
Pass lessonId from the lesson details page into the Smart Enrollment Wizard.
Handle pre-selected lessons within the wizard flow.

issues.title: Define enrollment preferences model
issues.body: Define the data model for enrollment preferences: weekly frequency, preferred days and hours, location/distance, preferred categories.

issues.title: Implement Smart Enrollment algorithm in Convex
issues.body:
Implement generateSuggestedPaths(preferences) in Convex.
Apply constraints (no time conflicts, distance limits, number of days) and scoring for ranking paths.

issues.title: Build Smart Enrollment Wizard UI
issues.body:
Create a multi-step form (wizard) for collecting preferences.
Display suggested paths with scores and allow selecting a path.

issues.title: Add unit tests for Smart Enrollment algorithm
issues.body:
Create unit tests for the algorithm.
Cover constraints, edge cases, and scoring logic for multiple sample datasets.

issues.title: Implement order summary page before payment
issues.body:
Create a summary page that lists selected lessons, quantities, and total price.
Allow editing/removing items before proceeding to payment.

issues.title: Implement Convex createOrder mutation
issues.body:
Integrate with Tranzilla to create a payment request.
Create a PaymentIntent record and return a redirect URL or token to the frontend.

issues.title: Handle Tranzilla payment webhook callback
issues.body:
Add an endpoint or Convex function to receive callbacks from Tranzilla.
Validate the signature and update the payment status.
Create Enrollment records on successful payment.

issues.title: Implement frontend payment flow
issues.body:
Redirect the user to Tranzilla or embed payment in an iframe.
Show loading/waiting state and final confirmation page after payment.

issues.title: Implement student schedule view
issues.body:
Create a schedule/calendar view for students showing their enrolled lessons.
Allow filtering by date range or child (for parents).

issues.title: Implement teacher schedule view
issues.body:
Create a view for teachers showing upcoming lessons they teach.
Link each lesson to the teacher lesson view for attendance.

issues.title: Implement admin master schedule view
issues.body:
Create an admin schedule view that can be filtered by category, day, teacher, or hall.
Focus on table or simple calendar view.

issues.title: Implement teacher lesson view with attendance
issues.body:
Create a teacher-facing lesson page that lists all students in that lesson instance.
Allow toggling attendance, adding notes and qualitative ratings.

issues.title: Implement Convex mutations for attendance and notes
issues.body:
Create updateAttendance and addStudentNote mutations in Convex.
Ensure proper role validation and input validation.

issues.title: Implement admin CRUD for lessons
issues.body:
Create admin screens to create, edit, and delete lessons.
Include validation and optional image upload or tags.

issues.title: Implement admin CRUD for teachers
issues.body:
Create admin UI for managing teachers and linking to Clerk teacher users.
Manage expertise fields and photos.

issues.title: Implement admin CRUD for categories
issues.body:
Create admin UI for managing categories.
Fields: name, description, image, display order.

issues.title: Build admin payments dashboard
issues.body:
Create an admin view listing payments.
Allow searching and filtering by status, date, and student.

issues.title: Implement payment analytics queries
issues.body:
Create Convex functions for aggregating payments by month, teacher, and category.
Return data suitable for charts.

issues.title: Implement CSV export for admin reports
issues.body:
Add client-side CSV export for payments, enrollments and other key reports.
Allow download with one click from admin dashboards.

issues.title: Build admin statistics dashboard
issues.body:
Create a dashboard showing charts and KPIs: enrollments over time, average attendance, revenue per month.
Use a chart library such as Recharts.

issues.title: Build reusable UI component library
issues.body:
Create reusable UI components: Button, Input, Card, Modal, Tabs, Table.
Ensure consistent theme and basic accessibility.

issues.title: Apply design system across the app
issues.body:
Refactor existing pages to use the shared UI components.
Ensure consistent spacing, typography and responsive behavior.

issues.title: Add frontend unit tests with Jest and RTL
issues.body:
Add tests for critical components and flows.
Focus on forms, wizard steps and key screens.

issues.title: Add backend unit tests for Convex functions
issues.body:
Write tests for core Convex queries and mutations.
Focus on validation, permissions and side effects.

issues.title: Run manual end-to-end integration tests
issues.body:
Test full user flows manually: from smart enrollment to payment and schedule updates.
Document any bugs and gaps found.

issues.title: Optimize performance and clean up code
issues.body:
Reduce unnecessary re-renders and network calls.
Tune Convex queries and caching.
Remove dead code and temporary debug logs.

issues.title: Improve error handling and user messages
issues.body:
Provide clear user-facing error messages and toasts.
Add fallback UI for critical failure cases.

issues.title: Configure Vercel deployment
issues.body:
Connect the repo to Vercel.
Configure environment variables for Convex, Clerk and Tranzilla.
Enable preview deployments for branches.

issues.title: Prepare production build and release v1.0
issues.body:
Verify production build.
Tag the release (v1.0.0).
Write a clear README with setup and usage instructions.
